document.full_text: syrian forces killed six people on wednesday in an attack on protesters in a mosque complex in the southern city of deraa, and later opened fire on hundreds of youths marching in solidarity, witnesses said.
document.title: syrian forces shoot protesters, kill 6 in mosque
lines_and_colors: syrian forces killed six people on wednesday in an attack on protesters in a mosque complex in the southern city of deraa, and later opened fire on hundreds of youths marching in solidarity, witnesses said.
